item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

1; If you’re using the base ‘Deltascape’, then you’ll search in Clickingmost.java.

2; You are most likely using the wrong object ID, experiment with other ones.

3; Autospawn.cfg for the NPC, Shops.cfg for the shop name, their cost price, and the actual items.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @freeky freeky
item.description:
@freeky wrote:

Ok so i wanted to change were you teleport to when you clicked one of the teleports and i also wanted to know hwo to put it so when i attack a certain object i get exp for a certian skill i got this so far for attacking an object and getting exp

if (objectID == 823) { setAnimation(407); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[0]), 0); sM("You hit the bag, and you get attack exp!"); }

but that only works for one object when i try to do it for something else it don work look

if (objectID == 299) { setAnimation(424); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[3]), 0); sM("You serach the hay stack, and you get def exp!"); }

ok now for the other thing.

I wanted to know how to spawn an npc e.g shop.

Read full topic
